title: kamala kanthamaNi
sahitya:
kamala kAntAmaNi bhUshana (shrI)
vimalAtmA shAnta krpAvIkshaNa
(shrI kamala)                  


anupallavi

amararcita sukharava dasavida
gamaka prada sunAda sammOdhita
(kamala)                         

caraNam

pancEndriya jita pavanAtmaja hita
manjuLa mrudukara hrudayAmbuja stitha
ranjita bhashana ramya sulOcana
sancalamu pAragroli nannElina
(kamala)
